definitions.definition: A poor, rural , usually white , person from the Southern United States or parts of the Midwest and Northeast , especially one whose beliefs are seen as unsophisticated and backward ; sometimes with additional connotations of being bigoted .
definitions.label_groups: slang , US , usually derogatory , offensive , ethnic slur

definitions.definition: Any of the miners who wore red bandanas for identification during the West Virginia mine war of 1921.
A member of a certain Baltimore street gang, active in 1859.

definitions.label_groups: UK , archaic , 19th and 20th centuries , religious slur

main_definition: ( slang , US , usually derogatory , offensive , ethnic slur ) A poor, rural , usually white , person from the Southern United States or parts of the Midwest and Northeast , especially one whose beliefs are seen as unsophisticated and backward ; sometimes with additional connotations of being bigoted .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , derogatory ) yokel , hick , country bumpkin
( historical , slang , US ) Any of the miners who wore red bandanas for identification during the West Virginia mine war of 1921.
( historical , slang , US ) A member of a certain Baltimore street gang, active in 1859.
( UK , archaic , 19th and 20th centuries , religious slur ) A Roman Catholic .
